about_the_game:
Somewhere in the Mediterranean...

An enthusiastic adventurer is about to embark on a special mission: leading a chaotic team of unruly members in the hunt for a mysterious treasure. A vibrant night in the woods awaits, unveiling a memorable adventure, but beware—the shadows conceal a watchful presence. They are not alone...

A Short But Intense Graphic Adventure

The Campsite is a short point-and-click adventure game, inspired by and crafted in the style of early genre classics, and adapted for a modern-day experience.

If you have a passion for graphic adventures but never find the time to play, this might be exactly what you’re looking for.

With about 60 minutes of gameplay, a simplified UI, and no dialogue trees, it is an excellent choice for casual players. It can be played anytime, alone or with others, and is suitable for all ages.

For those new to classic point-and-click adventures, The Campsite is a great starting point. Featuring a balanced difficulty level and lighter gameplay, it offers an accessible and enjoyable experience for beginners, and hopefully, you’ll be captivated by the magic that makes this genre so special!

Features

  • Rich storytelling
    Explore richly crafted characters and an intricately woven storyline, featuring a three-act structure with captivating twists.

  • Immersive soundtrack and SFX
    A wide variety of original ambience sounds and music specially composed and recorded to match every mood and scene of the game.

  • Meticulously crafted graphics
    No AI-generated or processed images. Just labor-intensive hand-drawn pixel art.

  • Enhanced accessibility
    Enjoy a more inclusive gaming experience with hotspot highlighting, adjustable subtitle speed, dialogue clues, and more.

  • Just point and click
    Experience a monkey-friendly, simplified interface—every action is only a single click away!

Car interior simulator included!

Likely the first and only point-and-click adventure game to feature a realistic car interior simulator of the timeless Mediterranean classic, the '600,' fully equipped with cutting-edge technology.

Credits

The Campsite

Created by G. Espias

© 2024-2025 Guillem Espias. All rights reserved.

I hope you enjoy it! And please, feel free to reach out to me for any questions or feedback. It will be greatly appreciated! :)

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 (64-bit) or later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo (64-bit) or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+ compatible
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: ALSA or PulseAudio compatible
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 / SteamOS (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i3 or better
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated GPU (NVIDIA GTX 750 / AMD Radeon HD 7850 or better)
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: ALSA or PulseAudio compatible
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
